name: User validates that the VCM-Options section is returned and the DisplayGroup values.

testSteps.description:
Given Mathew has a list of models to be Compared
| code | llpCode |
| CUT201917DP4L93C | 2TH |

And He has a stateCode for the Request
| stateCode |
| LA |
When He Makes a post request to configuration-Compare service with the Models and Ccode

children.description: Mathew executes a POST on the resource /configuration-compare/compare

        "RSK-01": {
            "description": "SiriusXM Guardian™ Connected Services w/1-Yr Trial",
            "details": "Stay connected to your vehicle as you venture on the road ahead with a free trial of up to 12 months of Uconnect® with SiriusXM Guardian™[1] . All SiriusXM Guardian™-equipped vehicles come with a 12-month free trial effective on the date of purchase or lease of a new vehicle. Enrollment in the trial is required to receive service. Upon expiration of the trial period, purchase of a subscription is required to continue SiriusXM Guardian. SiriusXM Guardian is available only on equipped vehicles purchased within the United States and Puerto Rico. Services can only be used where cellular coverage is available. See Uconnect and SiriusXM Guardian Terms of Service for complete service limitations. <br><br> 2. In the event of a medical or other emergency, press the SOS button to be connected to a Customer Care agent who can direct emergency assistance to your vehicle's location. <br><br> 3. Roadside Assistance Call provides direct calling to Roadside Assistance Service. Vehicle must be within the United States, Puerto Rico or Canada and have network coverage. Additional roadside assistance charges may apply. Check warranty for details. <br><br>4. Stolen vehicle police report required. <br><br> 5. Send & Go requires a vehicle equipped with a Uconnect® 8.4 NAV unit. To use Send & Go, you must have the SiriusXM Guardian™ mobile app installed on a compatible smartphone and have an active subscription to SiriusXM Guardian. <br><br> 6. userStory.storyName: Validate response returned from successful Model Compare Request.
userStory.narrative:
User submits a post request to the Configuration-compare service with x number of ccode's & Llp's.
  The system verifies validates the request body and retrieves the Compare data for all models in the Request.
  The User then verifies that response is Success, Validates the json Schema of the Response and
  then verifies the data returned in the Response.
